title: Rubit Small Heart Aluminum Dog Tag Clip - Pink
features: Attaches directly to a dog collar
Easily move dog tags, change dog collars, secure and quick fastening
Durable Non Corrosive clip, made of Anodized Aluminum
Remove the Rubit to quiet tag jingle at night
For large, medium and small dogs
description: The Rubit (roo'-bit') Dog Tag Clip is a simple, stylish, and secure clip that let's you swiftly transition your dog's tags to different collars. At Rubit our goal was to create a product tough enough to take years of trips to the dog-park and to create a unique and simple design language dog owners will love. Pick the color and size that you like. Available in 3 sizes: Small 21mm/0.85-inch (about the size of a nickel) - Fits most D rings on 5/8-inch and narrower collars Medium 27mm/1.07-inch (a little smaller than a quarter) - Fits most D rings on 3/4-inch - 1-inch wide collars Large 33mm/1.3-inch (about the size of a quarter) - Fits most D rings on 3/4-inch and wider collars . You will quickly appreciate and love the Rubit! Dog Tag Clip.
